humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple sentinel lymph nodes from both the right and left axillae were negative for metastatic carcinoma. This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 8, which state that N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that multiple sentinel lymph nodes were removed from both the right and left axillae, and all were negative for metastatic carcinoma (right axillary nodes - sections A, B, C; left axillary nodes - sections E, D, F, G, H). Therefore, the patient's N stage is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
